title: Your Post-Election Guide to Trump, D.C. and 2020
description:
During his first two years in office, President Donald Trump governed with almost total control of Washington. That now changes. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Washington bureau chief Craig Gordon on what the new balance of power means for Trump, Democrats and the 2020 election. 
FOLLOW UP
 Craig's latest report: Vengeful Democrats vs. Angry Trump: A Post-Election Guide to D.C.
You can follow Craig at: @dcraiggordon
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
itunes:author: Bloomberg
